scripts.setup: npm run setup:linux || npm run setup:windows
scripts.setup:windows: if not exist venv ( py -m venv venv ) && .\venv\Scripts\python.exe -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup:linux: if [ ! -d "Uvenv" ]; then python3 -m venv Uvenv; fi && ./Uvenv/bin/python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: npm run dev:linux || npm run dev:windows
